entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
